definition: the act of distributing things into classes or categories of the same type
details:
noun
- the act of distributing things into classes or categories of the same type
= synonyms: categorisation, classification, compartmentalization, compartmentalisation, assortment
- the basic cognitive process of arranging into classes or categories
= synonyms: categorisation, classification, sorting
- a group of people or things arranged by class or category
= synonyms: categorisation, classification
